Name: Bamboo (Joaquín Simó's recipe)
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a recipe by Joaquín Simó, New York City, USA. Bamboo Cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Bamboo (Joaquín Simó's recipe) contains 108 calories
